articles.title: As Ukrainian Troops Advance In Kherson, A Glimpse Of The Russian Withdrawal - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Ukrainian forces are advancing in the southern Kherson region, pummeling Russian forces and pushing toward the city of Kherson, whose recapture would be a major victory. Social-media photos and videos posted by troops leaving the right bank of the Dnieper Riv…
articles.content: The photograph, showing a man in combat fatigues posing on a river ferry alongside Russian military equipment, was posted on Russian social media on October 10. Three days later, a video that appeare… [+6717 chars]

articles.title: SpaceX hired for two European launches to fill gap left by Russia - CNA
articles.description: PARIS : Europe will commission two rocket launches from Elon Musk's SpaceX after the Ukraine conflict barred access to Russia's Soyuz, the European Space Agency (ESA) confirmed on Thursday.The launches include the Euclid space telescope and the Hera probe, a …
articles.content:
